issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

The app is never succeeding at sending a ti.end event before the app shuts down. Would be very nice to get into 0.8.0

{html}
fields.summary: iphone Analytics: ti.end is not sent before app exits

comments.body:
{html}

TitaniumHost now will have a pair of commands open to modules, -[pauseTermination] and -[resumeTermination]. On termination, the host will wait for up to 2 seconds after the endModule sequence. I'm adding to analytics that all comms will pause termination until completion.

{html}
